Acolyte

You follow set of principles in your belief system or religious practice, referred to as your Divine Doctrine. Each Divine Doctrine consists of Virtues, Taboos, and Domains.
When you act against your Virtues or engage in a Taboo, reduce your Concordance by 1.
Select two items from the list below to be your Virtues and two items to be your Taboos:
Temperance, Indulgence, Avarice, Charity, Humility, Compassion, Wrath, Courage, Deceipt, Justice, Loyalty, Honesty . . .
Select 2 Effect Skills from the list below to be your Domain:
Bellor, Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nox, Ordi, Rime, Tempest, Vivus
Commitment to your Divine Doctrine lets you access Rites. If one your Rite's result set contains a 1, reduce your Concordance by 1.
If you attempt to use a Rite when you Concordance is below 0, add 1 Hazard die to the roll for each point your Concordance is below 0.

Increase your Composure Rank to 2 (d8).

Increase one of your Domain Ranks to 2 (d8).

Increase one of your Domain Ranks to 2 (d8).

Increase one of your Domain Ranks to 3 (d10).

Aberrant

You have an innate ability that deviates from the normal.
When you gain this Talent, choose one of the following Effect Skill to be your Aberration:
Destroy, Intuit, Luck, Resist

Increase your Abberation Rank to 2 (d8).

Increase your Abberation Rank to 3 (d10).

Mystic

You hold knowledge of the mysteries of the cosmos, bending secret powers to your will. You gain access to Arcana.
Intuit, Research, or use your Insight to unravel these mysteries further, gaining Hits in Arcana Ranks to invest in your Arcana.
You may use this Ability without spending an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 4 Actions.

Your pursuit of Arcana expose you to Strain.
When you roll one of your Affinity to invoke and Arcana, you gain Strain according to the result as soon as the Arcana effects resolve.
Strain accumulates over the course of your adventures, only reducing by 1d6 at the conclusion of a Waypoint.
You suffer the effects of Strain according to the Straing Effects Table table below. Strain Effects are cumulative:
Strain Effect
0-4 No effect
5-9 Fatigued 1
10-14 Confused
15-19 Fatigued 2
20-24 Vulnerable 3
25-29 Stunned 4
30+ Dead

Increase your Insight Rank to 3 (d10).

Increase one of your Affinity Ranks to 2 (d8).

Increase one of your Affinity Ranks to 2 (d8).

Increase one of your Affinity Ranks to 3 (d10).

Increase you Uncanny Trait rating by +1.

Once per Waypoint, you may invoke your dipmoatic staus to avoid arrest or legal consequences for minor offenses.

You are an expert at arranging advantageous deals and alliances, leveraging your noble prowess to gain favors and resources.

You excel at forming discrete alliances ensuring mutual benefits without drawing unwanted attention, allowing you to add 1d+ Bonus Hits to any result set when you Persuade or use your Insight in a private meeting.

You maintain a network of informants and are skilled at finding enterprising local to gather valuable intelligence. You may spend Wealth while in a city and ask the BAMF X questions, where X is the amount of Wealth spent. Then, Deceive your informants to cover your tracks.
The BAMF will provide your answers at a time that makes sense in the game fiction.

Templar

Your are on a Quest of great importance. Write a new Target with the Quest keyword to represent this undertaking. Work with the BAMF to structure this Target. You may only have one Quest of this type active at a time.
Your Quest grants you Conviction, allowing you to access powers to be used in pursuit of your Quest. When you gain this Talent, your Conviction equals 5.
As you set out on a Quest, select one Effect Skill from the list below to be your Boon, and gain +1 Skill Rank in the chosen Skill:
Bellor, Destroy, Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nox, Ordi, Vivus
Each time you gain 1+ Milestones from a part of your Quest, your Conviction increases by +5.
If you fail to complete your Quest, lose 1 Renown and increase the Entropy by +5.
If you have no Quest, your Conviction is 0. You may write a new Target with the Quest keyword at the beginning of the each Waypoint.

Increase your Strike Rank to 2 (d8).

Increase your Boon Rank to 2 (d8).

Increase your Strike Rank to 3 (d10).

Increase your Boon Rank to 3 (d10).

If you succesfully complete every part of a Quest, you may immediately spend 5 Momentum to roll 1d20:

  • If you roll 12+, increase the Momentum by +3. You and all allies gain +1 Milestone, and you gain +2 Renown.
  • If you roll 11 or less, increase the Entropy by +5 and gain +2 Enemies.

Basic Shifts
Move
To an Adjacent Zone
Within your Current Zone
Defy Danger
Use Your Equipment
Reload / Restring / Unjam a weapon
Draw / Change a weapon
Use a consumable item
Initiate a Contest
You issue a challenge to a single enemy to engage you one on one. If they take up your Challenge, you enter into a Contest.
Create an Advantage
Describe a way to use a Skill quickly to aid in your allies efforts.

Roll up to Challenge to create a number of Advantages in the Current Zone equal to the total Hits in the result set.
Use an Advantage
Bonus Hits: Add +1d4 Bonus Hits to any roll.
Trigger a talent: Automatically use a Trigger Talent.
Ignore a Hazard: Remove 1 Hazard die from your next roll.
Re-roll a 1: Re-roll a single die in a result set that landed on 1.
Calm the chaos: Reduce the current Entropy by 1.
Wait for it. . .
Prepare an Action until a certain condition is met, such as when an enemy enters their current Zone or an ally lights the wagon on fire. The player declares the Action and associated condition, then waits to make the roll to attempt the Action.

Talent Shifts

Assassin

Use your Tactics to mark your target, giving them Aura X, where X is equal to Hits in your result set. Your target is Vulnerable 1 to any Action you take against it while the Aura persists.

Heretic

Use a Shift to maintain your Composure, immediately gaining 1d4+1 Concordance.

Berserker

Exert yourself, entering a trance-like fury to crush your enemies, see them driven before you, and to hear the lamentations of their women. You gain a Rage Aura equal to Hits +1 in the result set.
While you are in a Rage, you may decrease your Rage Aura by -1 to add +2 Bonus Hits to any Action using Exert, Endure, Grapple, Intimidate, Martial Arts, Strike, or Throw.
If your Rage Aura equals 0 or you use a Shift to dismiss it, you gain Fatigued 2 and Confused 1, and the Entropy increases by +1.
If your Rage Aura is 8+, you gain Fatigued 2 and Confused, and the Entropy increases by +2.

Conduit

Spend X Hits from the result set of the next Marvel you use this turn to increase your Attunement by X.

Defender

Use a Shift to protect 1 ally in your Current Zone.

Detective

Use a Shift to Investigate, then Analyze your findings, summing the Hits in both result sets.

Druid

Spend X Attunement and spend an Action to use two Marvels. You can add +X bonus Hits to either Marvel's result set.
Your Attunement decreases to 0.

Elementalist

Spend 2 Momentum and gain +2 Current.

Hunter

Use a Shift to aim carefully. Add +1d4 Bonus Hits to your next Shoot result set this turn.

Focus to enter a heightened state of awareness, adding +1d4 Bonus Hits to your next Shoot attempt or Initiative Test.

Knight

Spend X Dedication to add X Hits to your next roll.

Spend 2 Momentum, then take an Action. If there are no 1s in the result set, increase the Momentum by +5.

Marksman

Use a Shift to aim carefully. Add +1d4 Bonus Hits to your next Shoot result set this turn.

Use a Shift to Wait For It with the condition that an ally scores 1+ Hits against your target in melee combat. When the the condition is met, Shoot your target dealing Hits directly to their Grit.

Martial Artist

Until the beginning of your next turn, use Reflexes +1d4 as as your Primary Defense.

You assume a Defensive Stance, reducing all Hits from using your Martial Arts by -1.
You can maintain this stance until you use a different Shift as long as your Reflexes are above 0.

You assume an Aggressive Stance, adding +1 Bonus Hits when using your Martial Arts.
You can maintain this stance until you use a different Shift and as long as your Reflexes are above 0.

Templar

Spend 2 Conviction. The next time you Strike, Shoot, or use Martial Arts against a target this turn, automatically us one Effect Trigger from you Boon.

Increase the Entropy by +2 to regain +3 Conviction

Overseer

Lead your Minions to launch a coordinated melee against a single target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, dealing X Hits to the target, where X is the sum of your Minions' Melee stat in the target's Current Zone.

Use a Shift to Lead X Minions to score Hits equal to their Ranged Stat to any number of targets in their Current or an Adjacent Zone, where X is the number of Hits in your result set.

Use a Shift to Lead X Minions to score Hits equal to their Melee Stat to any number of targets in their Current Zone, where X is the number of Hits in your result set.

Lead your Minions to launch a coordinated ranged attack against a single target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, dealing X Hits the the target, where X is the sum of your Minons' Ranged stat in the target's Current Zone.

Necromancer

Lead your Minions to launch a coordinated melee against a single target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, dealing X Hits to the target, where X is the + sum of your Minions' Melee stat in the target's Current Zone.
If the target dies, one other target in the same Zone becomes Afraid of your Minions.

Use a Shift to Lead X Minions to immediately Shift to Move into one target's Current Zone. Minions must be in a Zone Adjacent to the target Zone.
Once in position, the target suffers X + the sum of your Minions' Melee stat in the target's Current Zone.

Lead your Haunts to launch a coordinated ranged attack against a single target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, dealing X Hits the the target, where X is the Hits in the result set + sum of your Haunts Ranged stat in the target's Current Zone.

Beastmaster

Lead your Minions to launch a coordinated melee against a single target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, dealing X Hits to the target, where X is the sum of your Minions' Melee stat in the target's Current Zone.

Use a Shift to Strike, Shoot, or use your Martial Arts against a target you can see in your Current Zone. On 3+ Hits, all Minions under your command may score Hits equal to their Melee Stat against any target in their Current Zones.

Probabilist

Analyze or use Arithm to gain Armor Defense X, where X is equal to Hits in the result set. When you use your Armor Defense to absorb Hits scored against you, you may immediately Shift to Move to an Adjacent Zone ignoring Hazards.

Nexus

Spend 4 Momentum and immediately use one of your Marvels without spending an Action.

Pugilist

Until the beginning of your next turn, use Reflexes +1d4 as as your Primary Defense.

Ranger

Use your Tactics to mark your target, giving them Aura X, where X is equal to Hits in your result set. Your target is Vulnerable 1 to any Action you take against it while the Aura persists.

Scrapper

Until the beginning of your next turn, use Reflexes +1d4 as as your Primary Defense.

Seer

Spend X Momentum to add X Bonus Hits to the next Portent you use this turn.

Shaman

Spend 2 Hits from the result set of the next Spirit you use this turn to increase your Rank in that Spirit by +1.

Shugenja

Spend 2 Hits from the result set of the next Spirit you use this turn to increase your Rank in that Spirit by +1.

Sniper

Defensive Stance


Position yourself in your Current Zone to assume a Defensive Stance.
You can maintain this stance until you use a different Shift as long as your Reflexes are above 0.

Soldier

Use a Shift to aim carefully. Add +1d4 Bonus Hits to your next Shoot result set this turn.

Use your Tactics to position yourself and an ally in your current Zone advantageously, choosing one target in your current Zone to gain a Vulnerable rating equal to Hits.

Tank

Use the Recover action.

Scout

Use your Survival skill to Create an Advantage while scouting ahead of your allies, adding +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

Your Concordance measures how closely you are aligned with your Divine Doctrine.
You may use this Ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 8 - Steady Actions (minimum 1 Action).

Use your Insight to reduce your current Strain by Hits.

Craft at Challenge 3 to gain Hits + Savvy in Concoction Ranks to prepare Concocions.
You may use this Ability without spending an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 7 - Craft Actions (minimum 1 Action).

All hostile targets in your Current Zone gain Fatigued 1.

Once per Waypoint, use your Insight to uncover an unwanted truth. If you score 3+ Hits, ask the BAMF one question about the game fiction. Answers will vary depending on the amount of infromation you and your allies have discovered about the game fiction in question.

  • Strike or use your Martial Arts against one target in your Current Zone, adding +1d4 Bonus Hits to the restul set and your target gains Wounded 1.
  • Throw one target you have Grappled into an Adjacent Zone, ending the target's Grappled status. The target and one other target in the Adjacent Zone take X Hits and become Prone, where X is equalt to Hits in the result set.
  • Intimidate hostile targets in your Current Zone. Up to X targets gian Provoked and your recover X to your Primary Defense, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

  • If Hits + Savvy > Challenge: Set the Momentum to 0 & your enemies pause to hear your offer.
  • If Hits + Savvy <= Challenge: Your team loses the Intiative & a number of enemies equal to Hits are Provoked by you.

Necromancer

When you use Mori to Stir the Dead, you may spend Haunt Ranks to increase your current Haunts' ratings.
Each Haunt rating costs a number of Haunt Ranks equal to the rating value (i.e., rating 2 = 2 Haunt Ranks, rating 3 = 3 Haunt Ranks).

When you use Mori to Stir the Dead, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When a Minion dies in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, use Mori. On 2+ Hits, up to 2 targets in the dead target's Zone take 2 Hits.

When a target you can see that has a corporeal form dies in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, use Mori. On 3+ Hits, all other targets in the dead target's Zone take 2 Hits.

Beastmaster

When you maintain your Composure to Tame Beasts, you may spend Beast Ranks to increase your current Beasts' ratings.
Each Beast rating costs a number of Beast Ranks equal to the rating value (i.e., rating 2 = 2 Beast Ranks, rating 3 = 3 Beast Ranks).

When you maintain your Composure to Tame Beasts, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the reuslt set.

Priest

When you Commune with Divinity to gain Concordance, add +1d4 Hits to the result set.

Select 1 additional Effect Skills from the list below to add to your Domain:
Bellor, Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nox, Ordi, Rime, Tempest, Vivus

Probabilist

When an ally in your Current Zone rolls a 1 in the result set of an Action, you may spend 1 Axiom to allow them to reroll the 1 without spending a Trait point.

When your team loses the Initiative, you may spend Momentum and/or Axioms, then roll 1d20+X, where X is the total Momentum and Axioms spent (X cannot be 0). If the result of the d20 is greater than 14, your team maintains the Initiative.

When a target that can see you score hits against you, you may spend 1 Axiom to force the target to reroll the entire result set, keeping the second result. If the new result set does not score hits against you, you may gain Hidden X, where X is equal to hits in the target's new result set.

Nexus

When you Attune with Essence to gain Attunement, add +1d4 Hits to the result set.

Pugilist

When you successfully score Hits on 4+ Combination Punches, use your Martial Arts against your opponent adding +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.
On 4+ Hits, your target becomes Unconscious 1.

When you Recover, regain +2 Defenses.

When you are in a Defensive Stance and take Hits in melee combat from a target you can see, reduce the Hits taken by -2 and use your Martial Arts to deal Hits to the attacking target.

Ranger

When you Shift to move and then us an Action to attack a target, you may spend 1 Hit to Shift again this turn.

When you roll Survival and score 0 Hits, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you score 4+ Hits against a target with your Warden's Mark, increase the Aura on the target by +1.

Reaver

When you are below your maximum Grit, add +1 Bonus Hits to any results set using Strike.

Increase your Strike Rank to 3 (d10).

When you Strike your target to death, immediately regain +2 points to your Grit.

When you Strike at all hostile Targets in your Current Zone. Deal +1 Bonus Hits to a number of targets equal to Hits in the result set.

When you Strike your target, deal +1 Bonus Hits directly to their Grit.

Scrapper

When you Strike your target but earn 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

When you Strike your target to death, immediately Strike at another target in your current Zone.

When a hostile target Shifts away from you in melee combat, they add an additional Hazard die to their next roll.

When you Strike a target for 4+ Hits, they gain Wounded 1.

When you Strike a target while engaged in a Contest, add +2 Bonus Hits to the results set.

Seer

Portent


When you have used 3+ different Portents this turn, a terrible thought enters your mind, one that you wish your could push beyond memory.
You gain Fatigued 2 and the BAMF reveals one secret to you about the game fiction.

Portent


When you have used 3+ different Portents this turn, you learn a dangerous detail about the movements of the Cosm.
You gain Fatigued 3 and may ask the BAMF one question about the game fiction.

When you Glimpse the Cosm and score 3+ Hits, choose 2 options instead of 1.

Portent


When you use 4+ Portents this turn, your receive a cryptic vision. The BAMF will describe the vision you receive, which may be unrelated to one of your current Targets.

Shaman

When you enter a Trance, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

Shugenja

When you Entreat Spirits, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

Skald

When you make an Initiative Test, you may forgo your roll to allow up to 3 allies in your Current or an Adjacent Zone to add +1 Bonus Hits to their result set.

Sniper

When you Aim, add +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set.

When you are in a Defensive Stance and a target Shifts to Move in your Current or and Adjacent Zone, immediately score +1d4 Bonus Hits against that target.

When you are in a Defensive Stance and 2+ targets Shifts to Move into your Current Zone, you may immediately Shift to Move to and Adjacent Zone, reducing Hazard by -2.

When you are the target of an Ambush, spend 3 Momentum to immediately make Shoot one target in your Current Zone before your enemy takes a turn.

When you Aim and Shoot your target for 6+ Hits, Spend 3 Momentum and the BAMF decides one of the following:

  • Your target dies instantly.
  • Your target gains Stunned 5.
  • Your target gains Vulnerable 3.

Soldier

When you Shift to Move into an Adjacent Zone and use an Action attack your target, add +2 Hits to the result set.

When you use Endure or Exert to tackle a physical task, add +2 Bonus Hits to the result set.

Tank

When you take more than 1 Hit from an effect, reduce the total Hits by -1.

When you Recover, regain +2 Defenses.

When you Recover, regain 2 Grit.

Thief

When you Defy Danger to Hide! and score 2+ Hits, you can take an additional Shift this turn.

When you use Legerdemain or Implements and score 3+ Hits, you gain an additional Shift this turn.

When you suffer Hits from an attack that includes targets other than your self and your Reflexes are above 0, reduce Hits by -2.

When you are the target of an Ambush and make an Initiative Test, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you attempt to escape being Restrained, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

Shinobi

When you score Hits against a target while Hidden, add +1d6 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you attempt to escape being Restrained, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you suffer Hits from an attack that includes targets other than your self and your Reflexes are above 0, reduce Hits by -2.

When you use a Shift to Wait For It, you can take a Shift in addition to the Action you take when the condition is met.

Spy

When you Defy Danger to Hide! while in a Zone with a crowd, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you suffer Hits from a target you can see and your Reflexes are above 0, you may attempt to Tumble away from danger. If Hits in your result set equal or exceed the Hits you would suffer, you avoid all harm and Shift to Move to an Adjacent Zone, ignoring Hazards.

When you attempt to escape being Restrained, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you are being searched by someone attempting to disarm you of your weapons and implements, you may use Legerdemain to hide up to Gear X on your person, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

When you use Stealth to avoid detection but get less than 3 Hits in the result set, you may spend 4 momentum to gain Hidden 5.

Scout

When you Perceive traces of your target(s) or clues about the best path to take but score 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

When you use Stealth to move through hostile or unfamiliar territory, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you make an Initiative Test in an Ambush, add +2d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.
If your team's total Initiative is 8+ greater than your enemy's, the Initiative does not shift to the enemy during the first round of the encounter (1s still increase Entropy).

When you suffer Hits from an attack that includes targets other than your self and your Reflexes are above 0, reduce Hits by -2.

When you are the target of an Ambush, add Hits from your Initiative Test to your Reflexes until the beginning of your next turn.

When you use Stealth to avoid detection but get less than 3 Hits in the result set, you may spend 4 momentum to gain Hidden 5.

When you are the target of an Ambush and make an Initiative Test, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

Operator

When you Operate a mount (or vehicle) and Shift to Move, you may Strike or Shoot at an enemy as part of the Shift.

When you Operate a mount or vehicle and Shift to Move, you may move an additional Zone.

When you Operate a mount (or vehicle) and Shift to Move, you may Navigate your way as part of the Shift.

Witch

When you Focus to Maintain Focus on your Ongoing effects, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you can see your Beast Minion and it dies, spend 3 Grit to return it to life.

When you Craft to prepare Concoctions, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

When you Persuade the spirits of the world to send you a Beast Minon, you may recruit a of cost 2 or less.

When you Focus to Maintain Focus on your Ongoing effects, spend X Grit to add X Bonus Hits to the result set.

Wrestler

When an opponet you can see tries to Grapple you, reduce Hits in their result set by -2.

When you have an opponent Grappled, you may reduce their Grappled rating by -1 to give them Vulnerable 2 and Prone.

When you Shift to Move into an Adjacent Zone and Grapple your target, add +2 Hits to the result set.

When you have an target Grappled and use an Action to Recover, add +1d4 Bonus Hits to the result set.

Weapon Master

Crusher


When you Strike one target in your Current Zone that is Vulnerable, the target gains Fatigued 1.

Crusher


When you Strike one target in your Current Zone that is Vulnerable, the target gains Stunned 2.

Niten


When you Strike a target and score 3+ Hits, you may immediately use another Action to strike with your second weapon.

Aether

Threshold — 2
Your Current Zone gains Hazard 2 Ongoing. It requires 2 Shifts to Move into or out of your Current Zone Ongoing.

Threshold — 2
Select one target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone. This turn, and on each of your turns Ongoing, you may use a Shift for one of the following:

  • The target takes 1d4 Bonus Hits.
  • Increase one of the target's Statuses one Status by +1.
  • Decrease one of the target's Statuses one Status by -1.

Threshold — 1
One target in your Current Zone takes X Hits, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

Rites
Spells
Spirits

Techniques

Current

Aether

Threshold — 1
Send a bolt of cosmic energy at a target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, scoring 1 Hit.

Threshold — 3
Send a bolt of cosmic energy at a target in your Current or an Adjacent Zone, scoring 2 Hits.

Threshold — 4
Send a wave of energy outward, pushing all targets in your Current Zone to the Adjacent Zone closest to them.

Threshold — 2
Open a cosmic tunnel between your Current Zone and a linear Zone up to 2 Zones adjacent Ongoing. While the tunnel persists, characters can Shift to Move between the tunnel's endpoints without incurring Hazard.

Threshold — 4
Open a cosmic tunnel between your Current Zone and a linear Zone up to 2 Zones adjacent. While the tunnel persists, you and your allies can Shift to Move between the tunnel's endpoints without incurring Hazard.

Threshold — 2
The current Timer expires.

Threshold — 4
The current Timer expires. The next Timer is set to 4.

Threshold — 3
Gain X Hits to your Current, where X is equal to Hits in the result set.

Threshold — 2
When one of your allies you can see suffers Hits from an attack, you momentarily send them to the Aether, reducing the Hits they take by Hits in the result set.

Threshold — 4
When one of your allies you can see suffers Hits from an attack, you momentarily send them to the Aether, reducing the Hits they take by Hits in the result set. Create 1 Advantage in the target ally's Current Zone.

Inferno

Threshold — 3
Deal 3 Hits to up to 2 targets in your Current or Adjacent Zone.

Threshold — 5
Deal 3 Hits to up to 3 targets in your Current or Adjacent Zone.

Threshold — 2
Deal 1 + X Hits to one target in your Current Zone, where X is equal to the number of consecutive turns you have used this technique.

Threshold — 2
One target you can see in your Current Zone gains Aura 2 as you wrap them in flames. They suffer 2 Hits to their Grit on each of their turns while this Aura persists, and they add +2 Bonus Hits in fire damage when they use Grapple, Strike or Martial Arts.

Threshold — 4
One target you can see in your Current Zone gains Aura 2 as you wrap them in flames. They suffer 2 Hits to their Grit on each of their turns while this Aura persists, and they add +3 Bonus Hits inin fire damage when they use Grapple, Strike or Martial Arts.

Threshold — 2
Deal 3 Hits to one target in your Current or Adjacent Zone. If that target dies, deal 2 Hits to another target in the same Zone.

Threshold — 5
Deal 5 Hits to one target in your Current or Adjacent Zone. If that target dies, deal 3 Hits to another target in the same Zone.

Threshold — 3
Deal 2 Hits to up to 3 targets in an Adjacent Zone.

Threshold — 5
Deal 3 Hits to up to 4 targets in an Adjacent Zone.

Threshold — 3
Target your Current and all Adjacent Zones. Deal 2 Hits to all targets in the targeted Zone.

Threshold — 5
Target your Current and all Adjacent Zones. Deal 4 Hits to all targets in the targeted Zone.

Lux

Threshold — 2
